segments.text: Excuse me , how can I get special discount coupons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Buy more and get more special discount coupons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get a discount coupon if I buy these goods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course You get a coupon for every 3 bags of sugar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But how much discount can I get if I use it to buy goods next time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 10 pence off if you use this coupon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I buy everything in the supermarket by it ? .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , you need to take advantage of it within its expiry date .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long can I keep it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The coupon can be used at least one year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I will take 9 bags of sugar so that I can get 3 coupons .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I will get them for you .
segments.speaker: S2
